mapper.update: update db_queryrobot set EXPRESSID = #{expressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SENDFLAG = #{sendflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MABANGEXPRESS = #{mabangexpress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGESTATUS = #{packagestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTRUNTIME = #{lastruntime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEARCHSTATUS = #{searchstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACKEXPRESS = #{trackexpress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, INTERNALCONTENT = #{internalcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORDERID, EXPRESSID, UPDATETIME, SENDFLAG, OPENFLAG, MABANGEXPRESS, PACKAGESTATUS, LASTRUNTIME, SEARCHSTATUS, TRACKEXPRESS, CONTENT, INTERNALCONTENT from db_queryrobot where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ORDERID, EXPRESSID, UPDATETIME, SENDFLAG, OPENFLAG, MABANGEXPRESS, PACKAGESTATUS, LASTRUNTIME, SEARCHSTATUS, TRACKEXPRESS, CONTENT, INTERNALCONTENT from db_queryrobot
